ValidationRule.description: 'Effective to date' field is mandatory for code 29
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( !IsNull( SPEN_PSRVulnerabilityType__r.Name ) && CONTAINS( SPEN_PSRVulnerabilityType__r.Name ,'29-Families with young children 5 or under') && ISBLANK( SPEN_PSREffectiveToDate__c ), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Select PSR Effective To Date
